option1.details: Grab your snacks, lower the lights and snuggle up on the sofa with your fave. Why not flip a coin to see who's choice it is tonight if you can’t agree.
option1.links:
Netflix
IMDB Top Movies
Amazon Video Movies
Sky Watch

option2.result: You should binge a TV series!
option2.details: Who doesn't love to binge watch a really good TV series. Check out the links below to help you choose, if you don't have a watchlist the length of your arm already that is.
option2.links:
`Netflix
IMDB top TV shows
Amazon video TV shows
Sky Watch`

option3.details: Take a break from cooking tonight and get some food delivered. Check out the links below and see what you fancy, is your mouth watering already?
option3.links:
Deliveroo
Uber Eats
Just Eat
FoodHub

option4.result: You should have a games night!
option4.details: Practice your poker face as it’s time to get the cards out! Or do you have a pile of boardgames that you’ve not played for a while, well nows your chance, why not wager the chores to keep things interesting. Alternatively you can do an online escape room! See below links for games.
option4.links:
Two player card games
25 Couple Games
Online Panic Room Games

option5.result: You should make a meal together!
option5.details: Is there a recipe you’ve been dying to try out? Well grab the spatula and your date, its go time. Food is the language of love so what better way to express yourself than to cook something scrumptious together. If you’re not sure what to cook, here are some great recipe sites, from making your own pizzas to fondue, I’m sure you’ll find something that’s perfect for date night, for any level of chef.
option5.links:
&0 recipes to make together
Date Night Dinner

option6.result: You should play on the game console together!
option6.details: There are some brilliant games that you can play together without playing against each other. See the link below for awesome games that you need co-operation and communication to successfully complete.

option7.details: Channel your inner mixologist and shake up a few cocktails. Raid the drinks cupboard and check out the link below and see what tasty drinks you can rustle up.

option8.details: Look out the tissue masks, hair masks and massage oil its time to chill. Light some incense, put on some relaxing music, pour a glass of wine and just breathe.

option9.details: Dust off your competitive streak and get ready to rock those shoes! Do you reckon you can get a strike, put your skills to the test and don't get the bumpers.

option10.result: You should go out for a romantic Dinner
option10.details: Dress up to the nines and make tonight special by treating yourselves to a lovely meal for two. Why not pick a cosy restaurant with low lighting to really set the mood.

option11.details: Who doesnt love dancing the night away and getting home at dawn with a bag of chips. Get your glad rags on and boogie.

option12.result: You should go to the Cinema!
option12.details: A night out at the movies is always exciting, get in the snacks and immerse yourself in the story, If you can't decide who's choice it is, make a night of it and see two!

option13.result: You should go to a bar!
option13.details: So many cocktails to try and so little time. Have a bar crawl, partake in some karaoke and just have a good ol' knees up

option14.result: You should go do an Escape Room!
option14.details: Time to stretch your brain muscle and do some puzzle solving, code breaking and sleuthing. Perfect date night option for those that are bored of the usual.

option15.result: You should go enjoy some live music
option15.details: Check out your local live music scene, you might find your new favourite band or start appreciating a new genre.

option16.result: You should go to a games hall
option16.details: Great for a casual night out. Play pool, snooker or darts, get a competition going to see who's buying the next round.
